abstract: Rio Tinto said it hadn’t ruled out tapping the equity markets for new capital to pay down some its $38.9 billion in debt, signaling a shift in the Anglo-Australian company’s previous stance that a rights issue was necessary.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto said it hadn’t ruled out tapping the equity markets for new capital to pay down some its $38.9 billion in debt, signaling a shift in the Anglo-Australian company’s previous stance that a rights issue was necessary.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Won’t Rule Out Rights Issue
